attributes.action: encourage the ATOC to introduce ATO in new and existing trains
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I petition the PM to encourage by grants or otherwise, the Association of Train Operating Companies (ATOC) to introduce Automatic train operation (ATO) in its passenger trains. Not only could this reduce expenses, but could increase efficiency of the train network. Which in turn may reduce CO2 emissions and lower fares.
